Grammar:   DataElement 4.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

EntryElement:   CodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a code constraint on the value"
Value:          Coding is FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   CodeConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a code constraint on the value's child"
Value:          CodedFromValueSet
                CodedFromValueSet.Coding is FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   CodeConstraintOnField
Description:    "It is a group entry with a code constraint on a field"
0..1            Simple
0..1            Coding is FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   CodeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with a code constraint on a field's child"
0..1            Simple
0..1            CodedFromValueSet
                CodedFromValueSet.Coding is FOO#bar "FooBar"

EntryElement:   SystemlessCodeConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a system-less code constraint on the value"
Based on:       CodedFromValueSet
Value:          Coding is #bar

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        CodedFromValueSet
Value:          Coding from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded
